TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TaskFactory extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供对创建和计划 对象的支持。

span.span: Provides support for creating and scheduling objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 提供了两个工厂用于创建和计划任务：The .NET Framework provides two factories for creating and scheduling tasks: - 类，该类创建和对象。The class, which creates and objects. 您可以调用此方法创建和执行的任务需要非默认自变量的重载。You can call the overloads of this method to create and execute a task that requires non-default arguments. > [!WARNING] > 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，则方法提供了使用默认配置值创建一个任务并立即开始的最简单方法。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the method provides the easiest way to create a task with default configuration values and start it immediately. - 类，该类创建对象。The class, which creates objects. 类使您可以执行以下操作：The class allows you to do the following: - 创建任务并通过调用立即启动方法。Create a task and start it immediately by calling the method. > [!WARNING] > 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，则方法提供了使用默认配置值创建一个任务并立即开始的最简单方法。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the method provides the easiest way to create a task with default configuration values and start it immediately. - 创建任务时通过调用已完成一个数组中的任务之一启动方法。Create a task that starts when any one of the tasks in an array has completed by calling the method. - 创建任务时数组中的所有任务都完成通过调用启动方法。Create a task that starts when all the tasks in an array have completed by calling the method. 静态属性返回的默认对象。The static property returns a default object. 您还可以调用之一类构造函数来配置对象的类创建。You can also call one of the class constructors to configure the objects that the class creates. 下面的示例配置一个新对象来创建具有指定的取消标记、 任务创建选项、 延续选项和自定义的任务计划程序的任务。The following example configures a new object to create tasks that have a specified cancellation token, task creation options, continuation options, and a customized task scheduler. [!code-csharp[TPL_Factories#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpl_factories/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TPL_Factories#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpl_factories/vb/factories_vb.vb#1)] 在大多数情况下，您不需要实例化一个新实例。In most cases, you do not have to instantiate a new instance. 相反，可以使用属性，它返回一个工厂对象，将使用默认值。Instead, you can use the property, which returns a factory object that uses default values. 然后可以调用其方法来启动新任务或定义任务延续。You can then call its methods to start new tasks or define task continuations. 有关说明，请参阅示例。For an illustration, see the example. ## Examples 下面的示例使用静态属性以使两个调用方法。The following example uses the static property to make two calls to the method. 第一个使用填充的用户的 MyDocuments 目录中的文件名称的数组，而第二个使用填充的用户的 MyDocuments 目录的子目录的名称的数组。The first populates an array with the names of files in the user's MyDocuments directory, while the second populates an array with the names of subdirectories of the user's MyDocuments directory. 然后，它调用方法前, 两个任务都完成执行后两个数组中显示的数量的文件和目录的信息。It then calls the method, which displays information about the number of files and directories in the two arrays after the first two tasks have completed execution. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Factory#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.factory/cs/factory1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Factory#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.factory/vb/factory1.vb#1)]

span.span: Creates a continuation task that starts when a set of specified tasks has completed.
The new continuation task.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法执行`continuationAction`委托中的所有任务时`tasks`数组已完成，而不考虑其完成状态。The method executes the `continuationAction` delegate when all tasks in the `tasks` array have completed, regardless of their completion status. 中的任务引发的异常`tasks`数组不是可用于通过结构化的异常处理延续任务。Exceptions thrown by tasks in the `tasks` array are not available to the continuation task through structured exception handling. 您可以确定通过检查引发的异常属性中的每个任务的`tasks`数组。You can determine which exceptions were thrown by examining the property of each task in the `tasks` array. 若要使用结构化的异常处理程序来处理由任务引发的异常`tasks`数组，调用方法。To use structured exception handling to handle exceptions thrown by tasks in the `tasks` array, call the method. ## Examples 下面的示例将启动单独的任务，使用正则表达式计算一组文本文件中单词的数目。The following example launches separate tasks that use a regular expression to count the number of words in a set of text files. 方法用于启动所有先行任务完成时显示的总字数的任务。The method is used to launch a task that displays the total word count when all the antecedent tasks have completed. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.ContinueWhenAll#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.continuewhenall/cs/continuewhenall1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.ContinueWhenAll#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.continuewhenall/vb/continuewhenall1.vb#1)] 延续任务在调用方法不允许它处理引发的前面的任务，因此该示例将检查异常属性的每个先行任务，以确定任务是否成功。The call to the continuation task's method does not allow it to handle exceptions thrown by the antecedent tasks, so the example examines the property of each antecedent task to determine whether the task succeeded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性值用于计划的所有任务，除非在对此工厂方法的调用过程中显式指定另一个计划程序。The property value is used to schedule all tasks, unless another scheduler is explicitly specified during calls to this factory's methods. 如果此属性的值是`null`，值使用属性。If this property value is `null`, the value of the property is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，则方法是启动计算密集型任务的建议的方法。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the method is the recommended way to launch a compute-bound task. 使用方法仅在需要精细地控制长时间运行的计算密集型任务时。Use the method only when you require fine-grained control for a long-running, compute-bound task. 这包括想要控制以下方案：This includes scenarios in which you want to control the following: - 任务创建选项。Task creation options. 创建的任务默认情况下的方法使用创建选项。Tasks created by the method by default are created with the option. 若要重写此行为，或提供其他选项，调用重载。To override this behavior, or to provide other options, call a overload. - 参数传递。Parameter passing. 重载方法不允许您将参数传递给任务委托。The overloads of the method do not allow you to pass a parameter to the task delegate. 重载的方法执行操作。Overloads of the method do. - 任务计划程序。The task scheduler. 重载方法使用默认任务计划程序。The overloads of the method use the default task scheduler. 若要控制任务计划程序，请调用重载，并`scheduler`参数。To control the task scheduler, call a overload with a `scheduler` parameter. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用功能上等效于通过使用其构造函数之一，然后再调用在创建任务方法来计划执行的任务。Calling is functionally equivalent to creating a task by using one of its constructors, and then calling the method to schedule the task for execution. 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，可以使用方法调用的快速方法是具有默认参数。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you can use the method as a quick way to call with default parameters. 但是，请注意，没有两个方法之间的行为差异有关：默认情况下不允许子任务入门附加到当前选项实例，而does。Note, however, that there is a difference in behavior between the two methods regarding : by default does not allow child tasks started with the option to attach to the current instance, whereas does. 有关详细信息和代码示例，请参阅[Task.Run vs Task.Factory.StartNew](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/pfxteam/task-run-vs-task-factory-startnew/)并行编程与.NET 博客中。For more information and code examples, see [Task.Run vs Task.Factory.StartNew](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/pfxteam/task-run-vs-task-factory-startnew/) in the Parallel Programming with .NET blog. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法以重复调用委托，它将生成一个随机数，将其解释为 Unicode 码位，将其转换为一个 UTF16 编码的代码单元，并显示有关所生成的信息字符或字符。The following example uses the method to repeatedly invoke an delegate that generates a random number, interprets it as a Unicode code point, converts it to a UTF16-encoded code unit, and displays information about the resulting character or characters. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.taskfactory.startnew/cs/startnew1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.TaskFactory.StartNew#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.taskfactory.startnew/vb/startnew1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用`StartNew`功能上等同于创建任务使用其构造函数并调用之一来计划它的执行。Calling `StartNew` is functionally equivalent to creating a Task using one of its constructors and then calling to schedule it for execution. 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，可以使用方法调用的快速方法是具有默认参数。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you can use the method as a quick way to call with default parameters. 但是，请注意，没有两个方法之间的行为差异有关：默认情况下不允许子任务入门附加到当前选项实例，而does。Note, however, that there is a difference in behavior between the two methods regarding : by default does not allow child tasks started with the option to attach to the current instance, whereas does. 有关详细信息和代码示例，请参阅[Task.Run vs Task.Factory.StartNew](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/pfxteam/task-run-vs-task-factory-startnew/)并行编程与.NET 博客中。For more information and code examples, see [Task.Run vs Task.Factory.StartNew](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/pfxteam/task-run-vs-task-factory-startnew/) in the Parallel Programming with .NET blog. ## Examples 下面的示例调用方法来创建一个任务，循环访问 C:\Windows\System32 目录中的文件。The following example calls the method to create a task that iterates the files in the C:\Windows\System32 directory. Lambda 表达式调用方法将添加到每个文件的信息对象。The lambda expression calls the method to add information about each file to a object. 每个分离的嵌套的任务由调用循环检查取消令牌的状态，并且如果请求取消，则会调用方法。Each detached nested task invoked by the loop checks the state of the cancellation token and, if cancellation is requested, calls the method. 方法会抛出在中处理的异常`catch`阻止调用线程调用时方法。The method throws an exception that is handled in a `catch` block when the calling thread calls the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用功能上等同于创建使用其构造函数之一，然后再调用来计划它的执行。Calling is functionally equivalent to creating a using one of its constructors and then calling to schedule it for execution. 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，可以调用方法调用的快速方法是具有默认参数。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you can call the method as a quick way to call with default parameters. 但是，请注意，没有两个方法之间的行为差异有关：默认情况下不允许子任务入门附加到当前选项实例，而does。Note, however, that there is a difference in behavior between the two methods regarding : by default does not allow child tasks started with the option to attach to the current instance, whereas does. 有关详细信息和代码示例，请参阅文章[Task.Run vs。Task.Factory.StartNew](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/pfxteam/task-run-vs-task-factory-startnew/)并行编程与.NET 博客中。For more information and code examples, see the entry [Task.Run vs. Task.Factory.StartNew](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/pfxteam/task-run-vs-task-factory-startnew/) in the Parallel Programming with .NET blog. ## Examples 下面的示例是一个简单的加法应用生成两个随机数字，系统将提示用户输入其总和。The following example is a simple addition app that generates two random numbers and prompts the user to enter their sum. 然后，它指示是否答案是否正确或者，如果用户的响应不是有效的数字，将提示用户重新输入一个有效的数字。It then indicates whether the answer is correct or, if the user's response is not a valid number, prompts the user to re-enter a valid number. 用于创建返回要添加的随机数字的对象。The is used to create the objects that return the random numbers to add. remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 StartNew 在功能上等效于创建使用其构造函数之一，然后再调用来计划它的执行。Calling StartNew is functionally equivalent to creating a using one of its constructors and then calling to schedule it for execution. 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，可以使用方法替换对象作为一种快速的方法来调用具有默认参数。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you can use the method with an object as a quick way to call with default parameters. 有关详细信息和代码示例，请参阅文章[Task.Run vs。Task.Factory.StartNew](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/pfxteam/task-run-vs-task-factory-startnew/)并行编程与.NET 博客中。For more information and code examples, see the entry [Task.Run vs. Task.Factory.StartNew](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/pfxteam/task-run-vs-task-factory-startnew/) in the Parallel Programming with .NET blog.
